title: Burt's Bees Naturally Ageless Night Creme, 2-Ounce Jar
description: How to determine the expiration date:The lot code is six to seven  digits long and starts with a 0, 1, 2 or 3. To read the lot code, the  first three numbers are the day of the year the product was made (aka  Julian Date). The next two digits are the year, and the last two digits  are a batch number we use internally for identification. For example,  lot code 0400901 translates to a product made on February 9, 2009 from  Batch Number 1.

title: 100% Pure Cosmetics - Organic Coffee Bean Eye Cream, 1 fl oz cream
description: What is it: Anti-inflammatory, caffeine rich green tea and coffee de-puffs and reduces swelling while increasing circulation to alleviate and brighten dark circles. Concentrated with potent anti-aging vitamins, antioxidants, and nourishing blackcurrant oil.Who is it for: Anyone looking to reduce the appearance of dark circles and puffiness.Truly, 100% Pure- no synthetic chemicals, no artificial fragrances, no parabens or any other chemical preservatives, no petrochemicals or any other toxins.No Animal TestingMade in USA

title: Burt's Bees Carrot Nutritive Day Crème, 2 Fluid Ounces
description: This lightweight day cream is chock full of natural ingredients like carrot seed oil, which is believed to naturally stimulate skin cell turnover. That's combined with beta-carotene to nourish skin, avocado and almond oils to moisturize and aloe vera to soothe and hydrate. The formula is especially beneficial to sun-drenched skin.

title: 100 Percent Pure Coffee Cherry Sun Damage Corrective Cream 1.6 oz.
description: 100% Pure Coffee Cherry Sun Damage Corrective Cream nourishes and hydrates to promote a clear, youthful complexion. Hyaluronic acid locks in moisture to plump skin and diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Caffeine- and antioxidant-rich green coffee and coffee cherry offer anti-aging and anti-inflammatory benefits to soothe and restore vitality and radiance to tired-looking skin.

title: Lafes Deodorant Spray with MSM, 8oz
description: Lafes Deodorant spray with organic Aloe Vera, natural mineral salts and MSM.  A gentle, effective and fragrance free deodorant that fights odor causing bacteria.  This deodorant spray offers the added benefit of MSM (methylsulfonylmethane) which is widely known for beneficial effects on the skin.
